title: Been getting this screen every time after I login, only happens on this computer

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: If someone could help it would be appreciated. I dont think i can see friend requests or honor points either{{champion:32}}

replies.body: Black screens like this can occur from a weak network connection that's unable to download assets.  Your best bet would be to go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to strengthen your connection.  Hopefully, you'll be able to see your friend requests in no time!
